html: We have loved #ArethaFranklin and her music. And we’re honored that the Queen was a great fan of #HAHN Today tributes have begun in Detroit and there will be a special dedication to the #QueenOfSoul at the start of tonight’s #HAHN episode. Please tune in at 9/8c on @OWNTVpic.twitter.com/plpSD6vVPw

html: Tonight’s episode of The Haves And The Have Nots is dedicated to our number one fan, Ms. Aretha Franklin. She loved every moment of this show. She will be missed. #HAHN

html: No more fear of flying my friend. You’ve got angel wings now. Thank you for your life and the legacy of music that you’ve left for us all. It will live on forever. 1942-2018pic.twitter.com/CiIlbUvG6D
text: No more fear of flying my friend. You’ve got angel wings now. Thank you for your life and the legacy of music that you’ve left for us all. It will live on forever. 1942-2018pic.twitter.com/CiIlbUvG6D

html: I can’t stop thinking about you and what your voice has meant to this world. If I came home from school on a Friday and heard your song Natural Woman, I knew my mother was happy. But if I heard You Better Think or Respect, she was upset and wanted...(cont) https://www.facebook.com/TylerPerry/photos/a.10150131483798268.334569.121492378267/10157172476113268/?type=3&theater …pic.twitter.com/C635eFPNIE

html: Hello from Lake Como! Here because Aaron O'Connell who plays Wyatt on The Haves is getting married tomorrow. Congrats @AaronOConnell and @NataliePack. May God bless your future days with as much happiness as you can handle! And then some.pic.twitter.com/RBK1G1Jrat
text: Hello from Lake Como! Here because Aaron O'Connell who plays Wyatt on The Haves is getting married tomorrow. Congrats @AaronOConnell and @NataliePack. May God bless your future days with as much happiness as you can handle! And then some.pic.twitter.com/RBK1G1Jrat

html: I was seriously saddened to hear about the midair crash over the Florida Everglades. My prayers go out to all of the families involved. Ralph Knight was my seaplane pilot for many years. He loved flying. May he Rest In Peace!pic.twitter.com/vTv4lcwbSK
text: I was seriously saddened to hear about the midair crash over the Florida Everglades. My prayers go out to all of the families involved. Ralph Knight was my seaplane pilot for many years. He loved flying. May he Rest In Peace!pic.twitter.com/vTv4lcwbSK

html: Another architectural marvel. Checked into the Armani hotel in Dubai! In the tallest building in the world!!! I’m not dreaming big enough! They built paradise in a dessert!pic.twitter.com/3LNIEXvJiP
text: Another architectural marvel. Checked into the Armani hotel in Dubai! In the tallest building in the world!!! I’m not dreaming big enough! They built paradise in a dessert!pic.twitter.com/3LNIEXvJiP

html: I always wanted to be an architect growing up. So, imagine a man with great vision seeing this wonder of a man with greater vision. God always has something to inspire us higher. Enjoyed my stay at Marina Bay Sands. The infinity pool is on the 57th floor! WOW! On to Dubai.pic.twitter.com/lEanRVadrC
text: I always wanted to be an architect growing up. So, imagine a man with great vision seeing this wonder of a man with greater vision. God always has something to inspire us higher. html: I’ll never forget the night you called me up on stage to sing!!! You would have been 60 today. Although you didn’t celebrate birthdays, I want to say “Thanks” for leaving us with such great memories and music. You are missed. You are loved. You are Prince. Credit: @AfshinShahidipic.twitter.com/96zlsAUXMq
text: I’ll never forget the night you called me up on stage to sing!!! You would have been 60 today. Although you didn’t celebrate birthdays, I want to say “Thanks” for leaving us with such great memories and music. You are missed. You are loved. You are Prince. Credit: @AfshinShahidipic.twitter.com/96zlsAUXMq

html: I just started reading a really good, funny, powerful, spiritual and moving book by pastor @carllentzNYC. Don’t we all need to learn how to OWN THE MOMENT.
